newsitem.title: USA: Olympic Financial to change name.
newsitem.headline: Olympic Financial to change name.

text.p: Olympic Financial Ltd, an automobile financing company, said Monday its sharehodlers approved changing the company's name to Arcadia Financial Ltd.
The name change is effective Tuesday and the company's stock symbol on the NYSE will change to AAC, effective May 15, the company said.

Olympic Financial has been doing business as Arcadia Financial Ltd in about half of the states where the Company conducts business. With the name change, the company will be operating under a single name nationwide, Olympic said.
